scrn_hr_smoke.Description:
Finally, one last question about you and your family. In the past six months, has anyone who lives with your child (e.g., you, a spouse or partner) smoked a cigarette, e-cigarette, or used any other type of tobacco? 
 Para terminar, le har√© una √∫ltima pregunta acerca de usted y su familia. En los √∫ltimos seis meses, ¬øalguna persona que viva con su hijo (p.¬†ej., usted, un c√≥nyuge o una pareja) ha fumado un cigarrillo o un cigarrillo electr√≥nico, o ha consumido cualquier otro tipo de tabaco? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

scrn_select_language___1.Description: Enable Spanish translation? (1, Yes) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

scrn_twin_reg___1.Description: ABCD Intro Script (optional) (1, Twin Registry Script) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

scrn_twin_reg___2.Description: ABCD Intro Script (optional) ( 0, Non-Twin Registry Script) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

scrn_braces.Description: Does (Child's name) have metal braces, spacers, or other dental appliances that cannot be removed? /¬ø(Nombre del menor) tiene aparatos de ortodoncia, espaciadores o otros aparatos dentales met√°licos que no se puedan quitar? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 2 = Unsure - (Consult PI) | If only regular fillings, removable retainers and non-metal braces (e.g., Invisalign), RECORD AS NO. If palate expander, determine if it is metal, and record when it will be removed. If gold teeth/grill, ask if/when they can be removed. If they cannot be removed for scans, ask how many teeth are covered. If more than four teeth, record as 'unsure', continue screener, and consult with investigator.

Levels.2: Unsure - (Consult PI) | If only regular fillings, removable retainers and non-metal braces (e.g., Invisalign), RECORD AS NO. If palate expander, determine if it is metal, and record when it will be removed. If gold teeth/grill, ask if/when they can be removed. If they cannot be removed for scans, ask how many teeth are covered. If more than four teeth, record as 'unsure', continue screener, and consult with investigator.

scrn_bracesdate.Description: When would they come off? /¬øCu√°ndo se le retirar√°n?

scrn_bracescallback.Description: If metal braces will be removed before end of enrollment period, mark to Yes call back. If metal braces will not be removed before end of enrollment period, permanent metal retainer, or metal dental implant that is clearly contraindication, mark No call back. If parent is unsure, ask for their best guess, mark to Yes call back. | 1 = Yes - Need to Call Back; 0 = No Call Back - GO TO END

Levels.0: No Call Back - GO TO END

scrn_met_inj.Description: Has (Child's name) ever been injured by any metallic foreign body (e.g., bullet, BB, shrapnel, etc.)? Or had an injury to the eye involving a metallic object? /¬øAlguna vez se ha lesionado (nombre del menor) con alg√∫n cuerpo extra√±o met√°lico (p.¬†ej., una bala, proyectil, munici√≥n (BB), metralla, etc.)? ¬øO se ha lesionado los ojos con alg√∫n objeto met√°lico? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

scrn_met_injenter.Description: Did the object enter your child's body? /¬øEl objeto entr√≥ al cuerpo de su ni√±o(a)? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No (Continue)

scrn_met_injremove.Description: Was the object completely removed? /¬øFue el objeto removid√≥ o retirad√≥ por completo? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No - GO TO END

scrn_met_injmdnote.Description: Would you be willing to give us a doctor's note confirming that? /¬øEstar√≠a dispuesto a proporcionarnos una nota de su m√©dico que lo confirme? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No - GO TO END

scrn_surgery.Description: Has your child ever had surgery? /¬øAlguna vez le han hecho alguna cirug√≠a a su ni√±o(a)? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

scrn_met_obj.Description: Does (Child's name) have any metal in his/her body or had any devices inserted in their body? / ¬ø(Nombre del menor) tiene alg√∫n objeto met√°lico en el cuerpo o se le ha insertado alg√∫n dispositivo? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

scrn_met_objyear.Description: What year was it put in? /¬øEn qu√© a√±o se le coloc√≥?

scrn_met_excl.Description: Is the device/metal exclusionary? | 0 = Yes - GO TO END; 1 = No; 2 = Unsure - (Consult PI)

Levels.2: Unsure - (Consult PI)

scrn_nr_hair.Description: Does your child wear non-removable hair extensions or a non-removable hair piece? /¬øSu ni√±o(a) utiliza extensiones de cabello no removibles, cabello postizo, no removible? | 1 = Yes - GO TO END; 0 = No

scrn_eyeliner.Description: Does your child have tattooed eyeliner or permanent eyebrow fill-in or permanent makeup? /¬øSu ni√±o(a) tiene tatuajes de delineador de ojos, relleno para cejas o maquillaje permanentes? | 1 = Yes - GO TO END; 0 = No

scrn_nr_piercing.Description: Does your child have any non-removable metal piercings on his/her head, face, tongue, neck or chest? /¬øSu ni√±o(a) tiene alg√∫n piercing (como un arete) o joyer√≠a met√°lica no removible en la cabeza, el rostro, la lengua, el cuello o el pecho? | 1 = Yes - GO TO END; 0 = No

scrn_weight_mri.Description: Is weight within acceptable range for MRI? (under 250 lbs) | 0 = Yes; 1 = No - GO TO END

scrn_claustrophob.Description: Does (Child's name) have serious problems with claustrophobia or being in small places? / ¬ø(Nombre del menor) tiene problemas serios de claustrofobia o para estar en lugares peque√±os? | 2 = Yes - GO TO END; 1 = No; 0 = Unsure

Levels.2: Yes - GO TO END

scrn_claustrophobexcl.Description: Has this problem prevented your child from doing anything, like getting into elevators or going to places s/he thought would be too small? / ¬øEste problema ha evitado que su ni√±o(a) haga alguna cosa, como subirse a un elevador o ir a lugares que pensara que ser√≠an demasiado peque√±os? | 1 = Yes - GO TO END; 0 = No

scrn_speakeng.Description: Does (Child's name) speak and understand English well? / ¬ø(Nombre del menor) habla y entiende bien el ingl√©s? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No - GO TO END; 3 = Unsure

scrn_fluency.Description: Has your child been taking some classes in English for at least 1 year? / ¬øSu ni√±o(a) ha estado tomando algunas clases en ingl√©s durante al menos 1¬†a√±o? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No - GO TO END

scrn_percept.Description: Does (Child's name) have any vision, hearing, or coordination problems that would affect your child's understanding and responding to the tests, questionnaires, and brain scans? /¬ø(Nombre del menor) tiene alg√∫n problema visual, auditivo o de coordinaci√≥n que pudiera afectar su comprensi√≥n de las pruebas, los cuestionarios y los estudios cerebrales y su capacidad de responder los mismos? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

scrn_percept_corr.Description: Can these problems be corrected with glasses, hearing aids, or other devices? / ¬øEstos problemas pueden corregirse con lentes, aparatos auditivos o otros dispositivos? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No - GO TO END | If unsure, ask if the child is able to sufficiently hear without the correction device during brain scans, which may require the device to be removed. Mark NO if child is not able to sufficiently hear during brain scans without a correction device.

Levels.0: No - GO TO END | If unsure, ask if the child is able to sufficiently hear without the correction device during brain scans, which may require the device to be removed. Mark NO if child is not able to sufficiently hear during brain scans without a correction device.
